response.name: about the same
response.feedback: Incorrect. This is the sample proportion of students who do not exercise on a regular basis (798 / 2,540). You want the sample proportion of students who do exercise on a regular basis.

response.name: about the same
response.feedback: Correct. Of the 2,540 students in the sample, 1,742 exercise on a regular basis, so the sample proportion of students who exercise on a regular basis is 1,742 / 2,540 = 0.69.
